name: Super Granny - 8 Bit 2D Platform Game
description:
~~ Super Granny ~~

Run away from the hospital to go to your favorite bakery, eat cupcakes on your way, avoid the medication bombardment and guide the Super Granny through her 2D vintage and retro adventure. 
Super Granny is a great eight bit platform game and is the newest platformer game in the store. Grandma Nan's adventure takes place in a block and pixel world. Test your ability to pass all detailed hand crafted unique levels, make your runaway nan the greatest hospital runner. Controls

Move Left: Left Arrow / A
Move Right: Right Arrow / D 
Jump: Space

Enjoy!
